name: southAlleghenyscanner
0:
”Alexa, open south allegheny scanner”
”Alexa, ask south allegheny scanner for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start south allegheny scanner”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: south allegheny scanner
des:
Listen to the latest happenings as they happen live in south Allegheny county, Pennsylvania. 
 You will hear a short ad and the skil will begin playing live audio from one of the fantastic volunteers over at broadcastify. 
 This skill is live police communications and as a result, long periods of siolence will occur. If you hear nothing after the ad, consider this a good thing and know that the skill is indeed working. 
 The feed notes states the following. 
 Allegheny County - Police Fire EMS

WEST – 
117 Bridgeville, 118 Carnegie, 124 Kirwan Heights (Collier Twp.), 125 Presto (Collier Twp.), 126 Rennerdale (Collier Twp.), 128 Crafton, 163 Green Tree, 170 Heidelberg , 176 Ingram, 181 Kennedy Twp., 189 McKees Rock, 215 Oakdale, 255 Bower Hill (Scott Twp.), 256 East Carnegie (Scott Twp.), 257 Glendale (Scott Twp.), 266 Cuddy (South Fayette), 267 Sturgeon (South Fayette), 268 Fairview (South Fayette), 269 Oak Ridge (South Fayette), 275 Stowe Twp , 277 Presston (Stowe Twp)

 This skill is made with love in Jesus name!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
